item.description:
"Benefits of breath" is a seminar on the science of breath. A practical approach to overcome stress will be discussed. Also includes an introduction to the Art of living course that has benefited over 30 million people in over 140 nations have experienced through the Art of Living course.

Below is what Melissa, Mechanical Engineer and aspiring singer at Stamford, CT, has to say about the Art of Living course.
"Amazing, soothing, mind-calming. I have tools to become aware and be present now; to be happy now; to give my 100% now" -- Melissa, Mechanical Engineer and aspiring singer."

Timings: 6:30 pm to 8:00 pm, Sunday Oct. 10, 2009
Venue: Sanjeev's residence
5 Vesper Hill,Trumbull,CT - 06611
Please bring yoga mats for your comfort.
Light vegetarian food will be served.
item.name: Stress: How yoga and meditation can help
